item.title: GLP 1s and Libido: An Effect That May Fly Under the Radar
item.description: GLP 1 therapies are effective but may dampen sexual desire in some patients. Here’s why and how to help mitigate the issue. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Could Oral Microbiome Test Indicate Pancreatic Cancer Risk?
item.description: A recent analysis suggests that the presence of three oral bacterial pathogens could help identify pancreatic cancer risk. Medscape Medical News

item.title: GPs Split on PSA Testing as Clearer Guidance Urged
item.description: Experts at the RCGP Annual Conference called for clearer PSA testing guidance to help GPs manage prostate cancer risk. Medscape News UK

item.title: How Dentists Could Help Close the HPV Vaccination Gap
item.description: Offering HPV vaccines in dental clinics raises rates of pediatric vaccination against the infection. Medscape Medical News

item.title: ‘AI Detective’ Flags Brain Lesions in Children With Epilepsy
item.description: An AI tool can detect tiny brain lesions causing drug-resistant epilepsy in children with up to 94% accuracy, potentially improving diagnosis rates. M...
